name: 三国杀-单机策略卡牌游戏
name_original: 三国杀-单机策略卡牌游戏
description:
Three Kingdoms Kill - Official stand-alone version, enjoy the joy anytime, anywhere

【game introduction】
Three Kingdoms Kill, smart people love to play brain-burning social board games, set history, art, cards, strategies and other elements in a competitive turn-based original classic "killing" game!
The continuation of the offline table games, incarnation of the three kingdoms, combined with "master, loyal, counter, and internal", through logical reasoning, and team members to achieve the ultimate victory!

[game features]
1-Three Kingdoms Kill Classic Gameplay (Pure Game Experience)
2- Changshuang stand-alone version, no need to log in, free signal free
3- Not afraid of God's opponents, bid farewell to undescribed teammates
4-Support login: Ten million players from all over the world, do you dare to let go?

【Classic lines】
1- Cao Cao: Ning teaches me to bear the world, and the people in the world are taking me.
2-Yu Ji: It seems as if the blue moon of the Qingyun is floating, and if it is flowing back to the snow.
3-Yellow: Please whip me, public.
4- Zhou Yu: Struggling in the blood and dark abyss! Pain, in the hell of hatred and hate!
5-Diao Chan: Fujun... You have to be the master...
6-Hua Wei: Go to bed early and get up early to be healthy!
7- Zhuge Liang: Looking at the image of the night and the night, knowing the world.
8- Jia Wei: Cry, cry out, struggle, then - die!
9-Ganning: You have too many cards!
10-Sun Shangxiang: Fu Jun, the body is tight!

Get the full version, please download the 三国杀 3.6.9.3 recast version
